description: Discord's detailed user interface developed with ReactJS. Contribute to eltonlazzarin/discord-ui-clone development by creating an account on GitHub.

description: Started programming in C++, with knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript languages and is currently improving his knowledge of Node.js, ReactJS and React Native.
